entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: meal localization by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1726
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1725

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.9...v3.0.10

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: @julianpoy/prisma-cursorstream to 0.4.2 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1727
  • chore(deps): bump the prisma group across 1 directory with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1661
  • chore: node 24 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1728
  • chore: build system updates by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1737
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1732
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1729
  • chore(deps): bump p-limit from 3.1.0 to 6.2.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1563
  • chore(deps): bump zip-stream from 6.0.1 to 7.0.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1549
  • chore(deps): bump the trpc group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1731
  • chore(deps): bump the capacitor group with 4 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1735
  • chore(deps-dev): bump eslint from 9.29.0 to 9.30.0 in the eslint group across 1 directory by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1739
  • chore(deps-dev): bump the swc group across 1 directory with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1740
  • chore(deps): bump node-fetch from 2.7.0 to 3.3.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1591
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1733
  • fix: do not use url.parse by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1741
  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1742
  • fix: stripe webhook compat by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1744

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.10...v3.0.11

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1743
  • feat: migrate stripe webhooks to typescript by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1756
  • chore(deps): bump the prisma group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1747
  • chore(deps): bump linkify-string from 4.2.0 to 4.3.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1754
  • chore(deps-dev): bump eslint from 9.30.0 to 9.30.1 in the eslint group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1746
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @types/multer from 1.4.13 to 2.0.0 in the multer group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1745
  • chore(deps): bump the capacitor group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1752
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1748
  • chore(deps-dev): bump @swc/core from 1.12.7 to 1.12.9 in the swc group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1751
  • chore(deps): bump @ionic/angular from 8.6.2 to 8.6.3 in the ionic group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1750
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1749

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.11...v3.0.12
